'''Topaz, Unbreakable and Fearless''' is [[Zhongli]]'s Level 4 [[Constellation]].

==Trivia==
* {{Lang|The first part of the Chinese name|zh=黄琮|zh_rm=huángcóng|zh_lit=yellow ''cong''}} does not refer to topaz, but instead refers to a special kind of jade artifact used in rituals in ancient China. A {{w|Cong (vessel)|''cong''}} is shaped like a round pen holder and can be various colors. According to the ''{{w|Rites of Zhou}}'', the yellow ''cong'' is used in rites for the Earth.<ref>Chinese Wikipedia: {{w|zh:琮|琮}}</ref>
* {{Lang|The second part of the name|zh=破而不夺其坚}} is a reference to {{Lang|''{{w|Lüshi Chunqiu|The Annals of Lü Buwei}}''|zh=吕氏春秋|zh_rm=Lü-shì Chūnqiū}}. The original line in ''The Annals of Lü Buwei'' reads "{{Lang|zh=石可破也而不可夺坚|mini=1}}," meaning "A rock can be broken but cannot be deprived of its hardness."
